email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight quote for the shipment of 12,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 42 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN BREEZE, which has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Michael Johnson
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The OCEAN BREEZE has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive given the current market conditions. However, we are open to discussions.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the additional details. We are considering a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment?

Best,
Michael Johnson
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per metric ton. The demurrage rate remains at USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the revised rate of USD 40 per metric ton. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Michael Johnson
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
